name: Web Development
description: Dive into the world of modern web technologies, from frontend frameworks to backend systems.

captain.name: Web Captain
captain.message: Ready to build the web? Reach out if you have projects or ideas!

longDescription: Our Web Development sub-community is a hub for developers of all skill levels. We organize workshops on React, Astro, Node.js, and more. Whether you are just starting with HTML or are a seasoned pro exploring cloud-native architectures, there is a place for you here.
vision: To create a pool of world-class web developers from NCIT who can compete globally.
